attributes.action: Apologise to Proffessor David Nutt and offer to reinstate him.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The government employs experts for a reason, they should not be ignored for the purposes of political maneuvering or dismissed because their expert opinion differs from that of ill-informed politicians.

This action further demonstrates this government's supreme arrogance and disconnection from reality and should be rectified as soon as possible.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
